channel.title: Kicksecure as Host
channel.description:
Any downside of using Kicksecure as host system compared to Debian for day to day use ( banking ,YouTube, etc)
Untrusted sites, anonymity tasks will done only on VM .
Must be apt torify deactivated to bypass bot flags on explorer?
Can the whole host system trigger bot on email and banking sites and such .
Any downside to use all above on VM instead of Host
Thanks

item.title: Kicksecure as Host
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
suse211213:

Any downside of using Kicksecure as host system compared to Debian for day to day use ( banking ,YouTube, etc)

There are no downsides for using Kicksecure as host system compared to Debian for day to day use (banking ,YouTube, etc).

suse211213:

Must be apt torify deactivated to bypass bot flags on explorer?

No, websites won’t notice if APT is torified or not.

suse211213:

Can the whole host system trigger bot on email and banking sites and such .

No.

suse211213:

Any downside to use all above on VM instead of Host

No. Using VMs is even preferable.
